channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts and is behind Mario from Ipswich, Emma originally from Barnsley, Jacqueline from Surrey and Greg from Nottingham as they try to beat one of the Chasers.

channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Liam makes a discovery, Robert's suspicions are piqued, and Pollard tells Mack the truth.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Ryan worries about Debbie's behaviour at work, Dev absolves Aadi of any guilt for the robbery, Lou asks a massive favour of Sally, and Billy overhears Theo lying to an old friend.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: The celebrities fend off circling reef sharks without the safety of a cage, Helen faces her fear of the sea, and Ade has an equipment failure while surrounded by sharks. S1 Ep2.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News at Ten
channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Yorkshire Ripper
channel.desc: This episode explores Peter Sutcliffe's early offending and presents evidence to show that his campaign of murder started at least six years earlier than thought. S1 Ep1.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tour de France Highlights
channel.desc: Rest Day: Gary Imlach presents the second rest day show of the 2025 Tour de France with a look ahead to the high mountains of Mont Ventoux and the Alps.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Suspicion
channel.desc: What Does a Kidnapper Look Like?: Psychological mystery thriller series. The five suspects attempt to uncover who framed them - or who among them is guilty - while hiding out. S1 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ainsley's Taste of Malta
channel.desc: Valletta: Ainsley Harriott is hitting the road again, and this time he is in beautiful Malta - in this episode, Ainsley starts his Maltese adventure in the capital city of Valletta. S1 Ep1.

channel.title: Good Morning Britain
channel.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.
